Our Story

“National markets are held together by shared values and confidence in certain minimum standards. But in the global market, people do not yet have that confidence.”

— Kofi Annan

Vista Labs is a third-party testing and product certification service provider located in Orange County. Our goal is to certify your product and help you access world-wide markets.

We provide full compliance testing for prototype and finished electrical and electronic products. We also help customers obtain regulatory certifications recognized both domestically and internationally.

The team at Vista Labs is with you every step of the way through the testing and certification process. We will also keep you up to date on regulations in order assist you in maintaining compliance for your product as standards change over time.

Questions? Email us or tweet to us
